channel.title: Twitter / nakajima
channel.description: Twitter updates from Pat Nakajima / nakajima.

item.title: nakajima: If you're at SXSW, stop by the Animoto booth (#717) and say hi. Not to me, since I'm still in New York, but to one of my excellent comrades.
item.description: nakajima: If you're at SXSW, stop by the Animoto booth (#717) and say hi. Not to me, since I'm still in New York, but to one of my excellent comrades.

item.title: nakajima: Gajillion > Bajillion
item.description: nakajima: Gajillion > Bajillion

item.title: nakajima: Explaining Twitter to Paul.
item.description: nakajima: Explaining Twitter to Paul.

item.title: nakajima: @jeresig: See that show as many times as possible. I saw him here in New York and it was outstanding.
item.description: nakajima: @jeresig: See that show as many times as possible. I saw him here in New York and it was outstanding.

item.title: nakajima: Anybody know best practices when it comes to managing Rails plugins with Git?
item.description: nakajima: Anybody know best practices when it comes to managing Rails plugins with Git?

item.title: nakajima: The Peepcode on Plugin Patterns is the best I've seen in a while.
item.description: nakajima: The Peepcode on Plugin Patterns is the best I've seen in a while.

item.title: nakajima: I've got a couple Github invites if anybody is jonesin' for one.
item.description: nakajima: I've got a couple Github invites if anybody is jonesin' for one.

item.title: nakajima: @blankbaby: If only you had some sort of Mac related blog where you could post your impressions. Alas.
item.description: nakajima: @blankbaby: If only you had some sort of Mac related blog where you could post your impressions. Alas.

item.title: nakajima: Watching "New York: A documentary film"
item.description: nakajima: Watching "New York: A documentary film"

item.title: nakajima: Needs some sort of Twitter IMAP so I don't have to read tweets at home that I've already read at work.
item.description: nakajima: Needs some sort of Twitter IMAP so I don't have to read tweets at home that I've already read at work.

item.title: nakajima: Didn't get to Capriotti's this weekend. Bummer.
item.description: nakajima: Didn't get to Capriotti's this weekend. Bummer.

item.title: nakajima: @pourhadi: What are your needs like?
item.description: nakajima: @pourhadi: What are your needs like?

item.title: nakajima: Eddie Izzard was awesome.
item.description: nakajima: Eddie Izzard was awesome.

item.title: nakajima: No matter good the writing, no matter how good the content, if your blog uses just one random picture you found on Google Images, it's shit.
item.description: nakajima: No matter good the writing, no matter how good the content, if your blog uses just one random picture you found on Google Images, it's shit.

item.title: nakajima: For the first time since I can remember, I'd rather go to sleep than write code.
item.description: nakajima: For the first time since I can remember, I'd rather go to sleep than write code.

item.title: nakajima: The biggest upgrade in Animoto history is now underway... and if all goes to plan, the users won't notice a thing.
item.description: nakajima: The biggest upgrade in Animoto history is now underway... and if all goes to plan, the users won't notice a thing.

item.title: nakajima: WIshing I could get to SXSW for that Javascript Libraries talk.
item.description: nakajima: WIshing I could get to SXSW for that Javascript Libraries talk.

item.title: nakajima: If anybody has any words of wisdom for embedding mp4s hosted with Amazon S3 in MobileSafari, please do speak up. I'm at my wit's end.
item.description: nakajima: If anybody has any words of wisdom for embedding mp4s hosted with Amazon S3 in MobileSafari, please do speak up. I'm at my wit's end.

item.title: nakajima: @jonnotie: I can't seem to IM you.
item.description: nakajima: @jonnotie: I can't seem to IM you.

item.title: nakajima: Installed git, added projects. Let's see how this plays out.
item.description: nakajima: Installed git, added projects. Let's see how this plays out.
